item.title: Long and deep hole in road, 14th September
item.description:
There is a long and deep hole in the road as per photos which caused a car accident today. Please advise who to contact to take further. There are faint markings around it so already identified it needs filling. I have more videos and photos plus witness to accident.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shakespeare Road, West Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The metropolitan police safer neighborhood CPSO offices free males CPSO Marcus mills CE 7195/CPSO Tyrese Thomas CE 718/CPSO Steven Fonseca Alba sitting on public bench in mabley park On 13/09/25 from 12:15pm - 13:30pm sitting on public bench for an hour and 15 minutes doing no policing work in the area or estates allowing criminals to crack on and get away with crimes why they sit on public benches getting paid for it. Taxpayers money well spent and wasted. Maybe these offices have been trained to sit on benches all day from their superiors. They also was a dangerous dog/k9 in the park at the time when cpso officers were sitting on bench. Owner of the dangerous k9 did not let his dog off the lead because of the police presence they just said hello and laughed and joked then when to another public park where the police would not see them letting their dangerous Dog off lead. Great police officers marvelous carry on with the good work. I could not join the police and sit on a bent all day doing nothing for the community this is disgusting from your local policing team. Metropolitan police commissioner. Sergeant Terry Hughes . Please address your offices and nip this lazy behavior in the butt., 14th September
item.description:
Police officers sitting on public benches all day not doing no policing in neighborhood. This is why crime goes on. Taxpayers money will spend.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Shalbourne Square, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Please could someone from the Hackney council address this issue of lime by company leaving bikes outside my driveway blocking my vehicle I am 68 years old and I have to try and move them out the way this is not fair., 14th September
item.description:
Lime bikes abandoned blocking my driveway.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Daintry Way, Hackney, London

item.title: Outside no. 10 and no.20, 14th September
item.description:
The whole street is very dark, at least 2 lights are not working, maybe more, as a woman i feel unsafe walking at night. The light in front of no. 20 often flashes constantly, now is totally off. i reported it over a year ago, still malfunctioning.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 20, Downside Crescent, Belsize Park, London
